entry.tran: 肮脏的;破落失修的;不体面的
entry.def: If you describe a place as sleazy, you dislike it because it looks dirty and badly cared for, and not respectable.
If you describe something or someone as sleazy, you disapprove of them because you think they are not respectable and are rather disgusting.

example.tran: 性用品商店和粗俗低级的杂志
